articles.title: Miami Heat’s Chris Silva breaks down after seeing mom for first time in years
articles.description: Miami Heat forward Chris Silva received the most amazing holiday gift on Friday when he spotted his mother walking onto the court before their game against the Indiana Pacers.
articles.content:
Miami Heat forward Chris Silva received his most memorable Christmas gift two days late.

articles.title: Fort Worth's top cop, 52, captured on video nabbing suspect after foot chase
articles.description: The top cop in Fort Worth, Texas, showed he can still hoof it when it comes to chasing and catching a fleeing suspect.
articles.content:
The top cop in Fort Worth, Texas, showed he can still hoof it when it comes to chasing down a fleeing suspect.

articles.title: Thousand of koalas feared dead in raging Australia wildfires, officials say
articles.description: Thousands of koalas are feared to have died in the wildfires raging in parts of Australia, with officials saying they believe up to a third of the iconic marsupial population may have been killed.
articles.content:

articles.description: Drug traffickers in Uruguay were hit with a major setback this week when local Naval and customs officers discovered a 6-ton haul of cocaine this week.
